response.overview: The youth of Vedas City have been captivated by a new video game but things start to go wrong when the players slowly start to vanish without a trace. When Adi's cousin disappears and Shiva starts to investigate he finds himself pulled into an alternate universe, where machines are ruling and the future of the entire human race is in danger. Can Shiva and the gang save humans from extinction?
response.title: Rise Of The Technosapiens
